Uses of Class
simple.ml.Tag

  • Packages that use Tag 
    Package Description
    simple.ml  

    • Uses of Tag in simple.ml

      Methods in simple.ml that return Tag 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tag Tag.getChild(String name)
      Finds the child by name.
      Tag Tag.getChildAt(int index)
      Alias for (Tag)FullNode.getChild(int).
      Tag Tag.getSibling()
      The Element adjacent to this tag.
      Tag Page.getTag(String where)
      Finds a tag using it's fully qualified name.
      We have a document with this structure:
      html body p p The fully qualified name of the 2nd 'p' element is 'html.body.p;1'
      Methods in simple.ml that return types with arguments of type Tag 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector<Tag> Page.getTags(String name)
      Finds and returns all the tags with this name.
      Iterator<Tag> Tag.iterator() 
      Iterator<Tag> Page.iterator()
